website_summaries.verdict: If you want a simple, affordable armoire, look no further than this durable and functional storage solution.
pros: Simple storage with one hanging rail and two adjustable storage shelves
Clean and crisp white laminate finish over solid MDF engineered wood
The brushed steel handles are a nice finishing touch
cons: Some users report not receiving all hardware

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wardrobe Closet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I shared a closet for the past four years and I was looking for something to keep my clothes in as we were running out of space. I put this together myself with only a screwdriver in about an hour. Getting the doors aligned is the hardest part of assembly but I love the way it turned out! I also added two command hooks to the door for my belts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet lasted a month before it fell off the wall and damaged my equipment. I followed directions, used the correct mounting screws and mounted into wall studs. The problem is the mounting boards on the back of cabinet. They are made out of particle board. The weight of the cabinet broke the particle board in half, as you can see from photos. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: AFish

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews have said this is a solid broom closet and it does have a very sleek modern look. Assembly was easy without help. I did not put in any shelves as I needed it exclusively for tall items which would not have fit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Hornet

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: We've bought so many portable clothes closets over the years just to watch them disintegrate out in the garage. Then, we bought an Elite closet. It was easy to assembly. Some pieces are heavy. It is helpful to do this with at least 2 people. Sturdy, clean lines and I believe will sit in my garage for decades to come. The instructions seems difffcult. Don't let the pieces overwhelm you. Read the instructions first then take it one step at a time. I am going to order another. Hope this helps....
customer_reviews.author: Uno1g

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASED IN NOVEMBER 2013 AND IT IS STILL IN PRISINE CONDITION. VERY STURDY AND NICE LOOKING TOO!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this very cabinet from Amazon.com in November 2013. It was fairly easy for my husband to assemble. He is good at assembling these type of projects for me. It was been one of the best investments we purchased for our food storage. It has withstood the test of time and is in pristine condition still after nearly 4 years. It arrived timely as I remember and was in great condition; no problems with shipping or the quality. I would definitely recommend it to others. We recently purchased another cabinet by the same company to match the other one because we were so very pleased with our first purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this five stars, as it was easy to assemble and fits perfectly above our washer and dryer. After about a month, I have to reduce it to three stars. I bought it for the purpose of storing laundry supplies (soap, bleach, etc.), and those products are too heavy for the bottom shelf, which sags horribly after only a month of storing these supplies. It would be fine for storing towels or linens, but since it's designed to go above the washer and dryer, I'm not sure this does much good.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I needed more storage for my clothes. It came packaged well nothing was broken chipped or had any missing parts. It is literally 10 pieces that goes together with screws. I assembled on floor. Put into place and put the doors on. Had no trouble adjusting the doors It has a heavy cardboard backing in the middle but has 2 boards for added strength top and bottom. I added a magnetic catch at top and a light inside. My preference. Instructions were just pictures but not to hard to figure out. It is heavy so you would definitely need someone to help bring it in the house. It took me less then an hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tooksgram

customer_reviews.title: A Simple, Elegant Storage Solution
customer_reviews.text: On moving day, this was outside the door of our new apartment, and was too heavy for my husband and me to carry upstairs, but the movers graciously carried it up for us. A few days later my husband and I assembled it. The directions said it would take an hour to assemble and low-and-behold, it took exactly an hour. I absolutely love it! It's sturdy, the doors align perfectly and the hinges are great. It's clean & simple, and looks terrific. I'm so happy with this purchase, and likely will get one more & place them side-by-side.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hanneman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, nice finish for inside use!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the space I needed. I was pleasantly surprised that it came with wall mounting hardware since we have it free standing. It looks so elegant even inside our home! I'm buying the extension next.
customer_reviews.author: Seabrie

customer_reviews.title: Skip this.
customer_reviews.text: The materials used are cheap. Once we got it put together it wobbled badly. The screws used to hold it together kept loosening. The doors had a half inch gap that we couldn't close despite following the directions for the "adjustment screw". The back panel was cardboard. The pins to hold the shelf in place were tiny and made of brittle plastic. There was no way they would have held any weight before they snapped off. We took it apart immediately and sent it back for a refund. Thank goodness Amazon has a great return policy because this cabinet is junk. Overpriced and shoddy. Skip this.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Jay

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: the wardrobe is of a good size, not too big. There are two shelves and a full hanging rod, which is the main reason i bought this wardrobe. the shelves are not wide enough to store much but they do the job for things like underwear and storing sweaters in the bottom shelf. The wardrobe was not difficult to put together though the doors need some adjusting. The price is ery good for an item of reasonable quality. I had issues with the sockets for the hanging rod and the Pre-pac company was very good with the replacement and also the free scheduled pick-up of the original item.
customer_reviews.author: rhonapap

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Fits perfect in my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits perfect in my laundry room. Make sure you check all the foam packing for your parts, easily missed.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Alternate and better way to put it together
customer_reviews.text: Good value and looks nice. Sturdy in the corner of my room. Hinges on the door a bit tricky to adjust, but finally got the door squared up. Strongly recommend installing the top section one side at a time and then screwing the two sides together after you put them down on the bottom section—otherwise, if you do it the way the directions suggest, the particle board will crack if you even slightly squeeze the full top section when trying to lift it onto the bottom section. It is also much easier to handle one side at a time.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaColleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Functionality, Easy to Assemble- but UGLY!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in box, well packaged... however, the outside part of both of the main sides appears to be smeared in some kind of glue. I thought it was marked from the cardboard/package and it likely could be wiped off, but I assembled it- naively - only to discover whatever is all over this will NOT come off. Highly disappointed that no matter which way I place this, it’s now an eyesore in my beautiful white kitchen. I ended up placing it next to the refrigerator so one side isn’t seen - but the other still looks ATROCIOUS. So maddening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Created Lots of Space in my Tiny Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small kitchen with no pantry. This fit perfectly in the corner and provides lots of storage! I have 3 large shelves set up in the bottom that holds cereal boxes and many other items! Top shelf also holds cereal box height items as well as ample space on the second shelf. Very easy to set up, however it is a 2-person job. Doors can open from either side very easily. Love this item and highly recommend to anyone! Great quality! I've had it set up for over a month now and it's been absolutely fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: KHS7W6

customer_reviews.title: Worst item ever purchased on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived scratched on all sides. There was absolutely no packing between panels allowing them to move around and become scratched. All screw holes in particle board drilled messy with pieces of partiicle board missing. This is the worst item I have ever purchased on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: cobrajet427

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a back
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. I needed a narrow cabinet to go between the stove and cupboards.....this fit the bill. The top was very solid.... over all fairly easy to put together. I did think it was not fitting very nice until I discovered the drawer glides had popped off the rails.... but for the price, I think you will love this. Just note that it does not have a back.....would be fairly easy to put one on though.
customer_reviews.author: Dean L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was packaged well and arrived on time. My husband was able to put it together in less than an hour. The reason I'm rating it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it was a tiny bit wobbly. However, the box included a way to secure it to the wall which we did and have had no problem. It is being used as an extra storage cabinet and holds quite a bit. It can be good for items that take up a lot of space - crock pots, rice cookers, large cutting boards or even canned goods.
customer_reviews.author: SMCT

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I did not give it a 5 star because there is a piece that is not the correct piece and I had to improvise. These cabinets are lockers and the locker lock latch that goes inside was way too small and the latch never catches on the stopper. I went to the hardware store and bought something that I was able to use. Now the door does not open unless I open it myself. I should get a discount for having to buy additional hardware to make the door close without problems. The issue is the manufacturer not the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Andres P. Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth full price,
customer_reviews.text: Nice and durable but came scratched and scuffed on all peices, including huge scratch on front of door. Packaging is not good at all. Screws will ruin and drill bits so DONT use a drill, screw driver is highly recommended. Instructions are ok, lacking detail so look at pieces carefully before screwing together. Im glad I got this on sale because its NOT worth full price.
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinets, but can't give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these before and like them a lot. Moved recently, so I purchased them again for my laundry room. They are easy to assemble and look nice, but this time 2 of the doors and one of the side panels have foam stuck to them. Not easy to remove, either. It's like it either melted on or is stuck with some kind of glue. I tried scraping it, but can't get it all off. It's odd, because I don't know where the foam came from. It seems different than the packing foam. More like white spray foam in consistency. Outside of that problem, I like them. Hoping I can somehow clean the foam off. Will try a few things.
customer_reviews.author: Khanada Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 265$ is over priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these units for my garage. I like these kits. The first one I bought for the price. It was 110$. Then I want another. The price was 172$. I want another, but now the price is 265$! I'm sorry, but it is not worth that huge increase in price. It is not solid wood. I will just buy another white cabinet that look close. 265$ for one fiber board or partial board cabinet is not market value.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Parts missing directions terrible . Called manufacturer still waiting to see if we can get the parts . We can’t even try to build it really . We did not receive the very bottom piece of the unit at all . Husband says some of the holes are missing and screws . This is hard to take as expensive as this was . So we wait !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Barrie

customer_reviews.title: A Rocky Start!
customer_reviews.text: This was difficult because right away we found that some holes were spaced out wrong. We had to use 'liquid nail' compound on parts of it and let it sit all night to dry. Finally it came together and I put my own spin on it so I am happy with it. No, it's not painted I used a vinyl wall decoration kit. But all in all I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet topper fits perfect over the standing cabinet. It comes with two metal dowels that fit on top of the standing cabinet for a perfect fit. Breathtaking!
customer_reviews.author: Voyager

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this purchase. Be aware that all packed together, it is HEAVY. I was unable to move the delivery box myself and had to open it to remove parts separately to where I was putting it together. Nothing is labeled but the step-by-step picture instructions were easy to follow, only needed basic tools. Took about an hour and half to put together. Needed a second person to help hang the doors. The one wall anchor provided is important as with doors being heavy is can easily be tipped forward. Looks nice, fits the space as measured exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very great
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed it within 2-3 hours for this big one and the upper one. It is very nice. He said it needs to be done according to the instructions. During the installation, he said he needs to adjust the hinge. But everything is on the instruction. It is very great. The only thing is that we want to buy another one for the utility room and the corner. But the width does not match and the corner one does not have the top one. I hope it will have customized width and heights for the future. It is a great one for this price. Because I do not know the situation of future usage, so I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lanhuacao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect corner cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect buy from my kitchen with limited cabinet space. If it perfectly into an empty corner and was fairly easy to put together. I am a 5’4” woman and I was able to put it together by myself within an hour and a half. It is very heavy though. I had my husband mount it to the wall when he came home from work.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: It’s a meh from me
customer_reviews.text: Mine came damaged. There is a pretty nice dent in the side of the front door. But I didn’t send it back because it’s freaking heavy so I put in together anyways. It’s up... but the doors don’t align properly and there’s a pretty sizable gab between the doors. I gave up trying to fix it. Also after about a week I noticed that the top self is bowing and I don’t have that much weight on it. I’ve had to remove somethings off. It’s an ok cabinet but if I had to decide over again I’d probably go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk- and dangerous !
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet ended up falling off the wall - not because it was installed incorrectly, but because the backboard that holds the cabinet to the wall was not sturdy enough- only two wood screws held the piece of particle board on this very heavy cabinet to the wall. It came down in the middle of the night - thank goodness. no one was hurt !
customer_reviews.author: Colonelswife

customer_reviews.title: Detailed Diagrams Directions and Labeling Pieces would be Helpful
customer_reviews.text: While I was putting this piece together with someone familiar with putting furniture together, it was hard for me to correlate the diagrams in the directions to the pieces. It would be helpful if the pieces were labeled with stickers. The cabinet doesn't have it's own backing, so if you are planning on not having it flush against a wall you may want to consider a different piece.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sahoo

customer_reviews.title: Poor appearance of cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cabinets for storage of my outdoor hunting clothes in the basement. I have opened one box to date and have the unit almost completed with the doors pending. The function of the cabinet is fine, space adequate and sturdy. The huge disappointment was the condition. The photos show several areas where chunks of wood were taken out and numerous areas with scratches. Rather than returning the unit, I have kept it as it is only for basement storage. Hopefully the unopened second unit is not the same. Unfortunately, If the cabinet were to be used in a room in your house, it would have been totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: SKK

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced
customer_reviews.text: It's relatively easy to assemble, although there are NO number signs anywhere on any of the boards. The boards could have been protected better, as the edge of one board was already damaged a little bit during shipping, although it does not affect the function of the wardrobe. Shoppers should be aware that the two interior shelves are NOT adjustable as they are screwed in and used as stabilizers for the wardrobe. Given the material used for the furniture, the DIY nature of the instruction, and the limited used of the interior space due to the fixed shelves, this piece of furniture is far too over-priced -- half of the listed price should be more reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: misr2us

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together and really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a broom closet for my small kitchen and this looks really good. It was really quick to put together and is the perfect size (whew) for broom, mop, bucket, and supplies. I held my breath that it would hold my upright vacuum cleaner but alas, it is too narrow. I put the "locker plate" thing on the front to give it extra character. I will recommend this thing.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinets....easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I installed 5 of these cabinets to upgrade a utility room and the project exceeded the bosses (wife) expectations. We love the look, the handles, and they appear quite sturdy. Only time will tell, but we are quite pleased with the product. The units were very easy to install and the directions were very well documented. The only negative I had was that there were no mounting hardware but it was quite easy to drill into studs with the right screws.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Make sure predrilled hinge holes are to the inside.
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars only because I like the cabinet. HOWEVR, the directions and lack of pieces being labeled gets a zero. Pay attention to the two side panels as you assemble. If you get them reversed the holes for the door hinges will be on the outside. No worries, if you make this mistake. We just drilled the holes all the way through. Since it’s in our laundry room and fits between the wall and our machines it isn’t notable. Manufacturer needs to realize what is obvious to them is not obvious to the customer, until it’s too late. Then you’re like, “ Duh!”
customer_reviews.author: DezDudez

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive petite Wardrobe closet
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our efficiency 1 bedrrm to create a closet in a 10 x 10 bdrm. I am an older woman and my 17 yr old daughter and I were able to build this cabinet in 1 hour. It was quite easy. The directions are pictures mainly. There were plenty of screws and parts. Recommend placing bottom shelf in securely and build up from there. Everything fit perfectly together. I was actually surprised at how fast the build went this morning. For a simple cabinet for clothing and such, i recommend this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Just a nice product
customer_reviews.text: This was nice to get. Feels well made. Yes it’s particle board but feels like a much better quality than a wall cabinet I bought at a box hardware store. Loved that the packaging wasn’t overdone (styrofoam, paper, etc)! Took me about 30 minutes. One thing that I did to make it easier to move around (to clean behind) was to add screws on the bottom at each corner. I recommend this and am thinking about purchasing another; the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: GR700 1985

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I just put this cabinet together this evening. I had no problems, all parts and pieces were nicely packaged in a very sturdy box which came exactly on time. Instructions were very clear for an assemble yourself cabinet. I am using it as a broom closet to hold my vacuum cleaner and broom, along with my cleaning supply basket on the shelf. Works perfect, I am well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chukka

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cupboard for additional storage in a very small kitchen. It has been one of the best buys we made and comes highly recommended. The box arrived all beat up and was left standing lopsided on the porch with most of it protruding and getting wet in the rain, so we were hesitant about the condition of the item when what was left of the packaging was taken off. To our delight there was no damage, so despite the heaviness of the unbuilt product, it was well protected by the packaging as well as safe from the elements. It was quick and easy to assemble and don't know how we did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Grum

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for a 5'1 petite size woman to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cabinet for all my scrapbooking items. I shopped around and Amazon had the best price. I really needed to put this together and couldn't wait for my husband any longer. I managed to put this together myself with a drill and some heavy boxes to hold up the sides. If two people work on this you can get it set up pretty quickly. There's more than enough room for my items and its very sturdy. You can also use the counter to work on projects. I plan on purchasing another one. The one negative for some may be that it doesn't have a back because it's an actual cabinet. I didn't have a problem with that.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Suits the intended purpose perfectly. Not a lot of storage space but at least it's useable whereas before it was just a wasted corner. I'm 69 years old and I put it together by myself in about 1 hour. However, installing the doors was, for me, a two person job so I had to ask for help. Very sturdy even when not attached to the wall. I painted it to match the wainscoting it sits next to and purchased knobs that match my other cabinets. Looks like a built-in now and I'm very happy with my decision to purchase this corner cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mowry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put together and feels sturdy for MDF. I put my own handles on it, which was pretty easy, and it is generously sized without feeling too large. Perfect size for my small space. Good piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Lovegood

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy and time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my first Amazon review is extremely negative. I bought this cabinet with high expectations and was let down numerous times. Let me preface, I’ve assembled quite a few things from Ikea to everything in between and this one took me nearly 5 hours. The (2) main reasons: 1. There is no mounting hardware and no predrilled holes into the back to attach the cabinet to a wall. 2. >1/4 gap between the doors. I tried releasing and tightening the hinges to no avail along with switching out the door panels. Lastly, you can’t “easily” install the door handles without drilling holes through the panels. Maybe the company forgot? Overall, a let down
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas J. Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet but use care when during assembly
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were reasonable, but basically you are putting together a box so not rocket science. The medium density composite material is easily compressed so you need to be careful to not over tighten the screws or you will end up mashing the edges of the cabinet. The two back supports each only are fastened to the cabinet with only two screws so I added some additional wood screws along the top and bottom edges of the back of the cabinet for extra support. When finally assembled and mounted to the wall the cabinet looks great and is a great storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Closet!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in perfect condition. Sturdy, Good materials, easy to assemble and a great bargain. This closet is deep enough for full size hangers with room to spare. Not like most closets out there. Put it together in less than 30 minutes only because I put a side panel on backwards :D Can be assembled with one person and a screwdriver though we found a drill worked much faster. Very Heavy...worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very, very heavy. Good luck if you ever move!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is heavier than I anticipated. It was so heavy I could not get it in the door and had to take the pieces out. The box was damaged and obviously no one really wanted to handle it. The cabinet was damaged during shipping. I could not lift the box, so I wasn't able to return it. It still functions, but I would order something else if I had it to do over.
customer_reviews.author: Sjb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pantry.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Very easy to put together. It has very deep shelfs for max storage. We use it as a pantry and ifs exactly what we were looking for. It's nice that it also includes a small wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cabinet, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I had the chance to get this cabinet. It is easy to assemble, took about an hour, it could take you less if you use power tools. I give it overall 4 stars because I would prefer they give the cabinet a good deeper standing base so it does not have the tendency to fall on you. So it is strongly recommended to hook it to your wall to prevent to fall. 2 moving shelves, the one in the middle is fixed
customer_reviews.author: Amely P.

customer_reviews.title: It was a horrible experience.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had several long scratch marks on the outside, the installation guide is a joke, took me about 2 hours to assemble it because in the middle of the installation process, I noticed that 2 side panels were locked in the opposite direction and had to disassemble and reassemble it, and the 2 doors won't close evenly no matter how I attempted to adjust it. It was a horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Robert the Rabbid

customer_reviews.title: Need Storage?
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. Normally I know what I want and I’m pretty quick to just purchase and not look too deep into the product. In this case I did a lot of research and I found the best brand for my price point. The larger piece on the left I had to get at a different on-line retailer, because they were all out on Amazon, but they all came at the same time and I absolutely love, love, love this storage
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and simple directions. Layout all the pieces first to make sure you get all the screws in the right place. The assembly took maybe an hour with a power drill. Power drill will make it so much quicker for you! It has made my laundry room so much cleaner and organized! I might get a couple more to organize my garage. It’s sturdy enough and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and install, Looks great on the wall
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet (54”) was very easy to install and hang. It seems to be very sturdy and should hold up well. The doors adjust nicely but I did put some rubber bumper stickers on the top and bottom inside to keep the doors from smacking the cabinet when closed. The only issue I have is that I wanted to store plastic bins but the bins are a bit too long even though the depth of the cabinet is 12”. I’m looking forward to getting a second set but of the 32” for another wall in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. Russell

customer_reviews.title: If only there wasn’t a gap!
customer_reviews.text: These cabinets are well made for not being solid wood and were easy to assemble. You definitely need another set of hands for the wall hanging portion because they are heavy! My only problem with them is the doors. No matter what I try there is a decent size gap between the doors in the double door section. I checked that I used the correct brackets and adjusted them as much as possible to decrease the space, but there is still a sizeable gap. Obviously they are staying up since they are already mounted to the wall, but I wish the gap wasn’t there!
customer_reviews.author: M Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Elegant corner storage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product an overall five stars, but there was a tiny little issue with the holes that support one of the shelves. They were not properly lined up. There was half an inch in difference. Fortunately, I was able to create a little elevation for the shelf and managed to make it work. Once that was resolved, I can honestly say I love it. It's the perfect size for my foyer behind the bar. Please see attached pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love this & would love to get the entire set. However, it's VERY heavy. That's great for quality & durability, but makes it a bear to put together & put in place. I can't imagine having the entire set in one place. The thickness of the material also diminishes the interior size. I can still get brooms in & a bucket in it, but doesn't quite fit other items I'd wanted to store in it. Interior = 14.8" x 15.8"
customer_reviews.author: musiquest

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in a small hallway
customer_reviews.text: This took a while to put together by myself with quite a few parts. I would say around an hour since I used manual ratchet screwdriver. The bag with the screws is tucked into the packaging so when you see the warning to check the box, follow it. I had all the pieces and prefer using the ratchet screwdriver since I’ve ruined previous flat pack furniture with a cordless drill/screwdriver. Watch a video if you don’t understand how to straighten the doors to hang correctly. It fits well in the corner and holds quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: V W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble; read manual to adjust doors
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this cabinet. Mine arrived with no chips and packaged well. Looks better than online. It’s sturdy and holds lots of pantry items. For assembly, the holes lined up perfectly. For those folks who have a gap in between the doors and aren’t sure how to adjust the hinges, there are clear details in the manual that explain which screw does what.
customer_reviews.author: akohana

customer_reviews.title: Great but a tiny bit disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Cute, sturdy, spacious corner cabinet and it works perfectly for what I wanted. Was really simple to put together by myself. I was a little disappointed by the door, because it looks like there is white tape or something around the edges. You do have to look close to see it, but it's still a let down. I already had plans on covering the door with a floral design, so for me, its not a big deal, but to others it may be.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of cabinet space in my kitchen, so this corner pantry was perfect. It gives me needed storage without looking junky. It was easy to put together - I did it alone in about an hour using a power screwdriver, but there aren't many screws anyway. It's mostly particleboard, so it's not high-end furniture; however, it looks nice for the price and works well for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: reegee

customer_reviews.title: nice cabinet & excellent customer service from prepac
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy cabinet with good storage capacity. It was easy to put together in terms of instructions, just difficult with one person because of weight (although I did put it together by myself). Only issue was there was a gash in one of the doors. I called Prepac and they picked up the phone quickly and sent a replacement door right away. I unfortunately received another door that also had an issue (reason for 4 stars), and they sent me another door. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa T

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but be warned
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but be warned, this item is not a heavy duty use product. My shelves are bending and one broke already. I would still purchase this again, I just wouldn't use it for heavier items. It is an attractive piece and does not take up much space while offering a substantial area to store and display itmes.
customer_reviews.author: RPineda

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cabinet for additional storage for my husband’s clothes. Yes, you read that correctly. He has more clothes then Beyoncé. It’s insanity. At least he is handy. He said this was easy to put together and it holds a lot. We are happy with it. One caveat. This item is something we store in the basement. I would never want this in my actual bedroom. It looks like office furniture. But again, for our purposes - we were after function over form.
customer_reviews.author: TerBear

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to handle quite a bit of "stuff".
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet was fairly simple to put together, easy enough to install on a wall and besides all that, it looks nice. That is the 2nd cabinet from this vendor that we have bought and are very happy with both of them. Price was right and I am sure it will last a long time. Mine is in my garage holding all of my "extra" golf stuff like balls, tees, towels gloves and hats. Has everything in it except a better golf game which I have to work on myself!
customer_reviews.author: The Chief

customer_reviews.title: Garage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knowing it wasn't a high quality cabinet. But I had a similar one in the garage for 15 years and figured it could do the trick again. The issue with this one versus the first is that this one doesn't have a back at all. Takes some extra securing from side to side to keep it from sagging. I've only had a few months so we'll see how well it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PLACE A MODERATE AMOUNT OF WEIGHT ON IT
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months of use it started tearing from the bracket that holds to wall. Then eventually it started tearing from the wall. It was correctly drilled to the studs, and there was never an extreme amount of weight on the cabinet. Some liquor, plastic silverware and filled rest with boxes of snacks. Far from the amount of weight I would expect a shelf to start tearing away
customer_reviews.author: ina zulciene

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Loved them!! Great price. Nice, needed pantry space in small kitchen and thought may look crowded but actually made the space seem larger.
customer_reviews.author: ludawg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful corner curio for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. The finish and quality are excellent. Fit perfect in my dining room. Assembly was easy but I do recommend mounting the top half before assembling to bottom half to avoid straining the back strews. Instructions say to assemble the top half on the floor first before mounting. This is perfect if you have floor moldings like me because the backing sits flush against the wall; see picture. For the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Estarija

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece - perfect solution for tiny kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It fits in a really weird space in my tiny kitchen and holds a lot - it leaves our walk way open and easy to pass. It came with mounting set to bolt to wall after assembly but we have not had the need to secure it yet - very stable but we also don’t have any small kids around either to worry about safety. Very nice piece for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. mt

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelf, Great Price, AMAZING Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little cabinet for a great price. Since it is on the cheaper side, the only flaw we had was putting the shelves in was a little tricky, but if you loosen the side pieces, the shelves go in a lot better and then you can tighten it back up. One piece did arrive broken, but their customer service is amazing! I went to their product site and put in a claim and they responded that evening, and the part was shipped the next day. They get 5 stars for that in my books. Nice shelf for the price. Also a lot more storage than it seems in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It would be quite easy to mar the finish if you are not careful
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these units to place in the utility room. The assembly of the cabinets was straight forward and the assembly instructions were quite clear. They are not solid wood but a composite and are covered with a thin coat of white veneer. It would be quite easy to mar the finish if you are not careful. I assembled both cabinets on a carpeted room. After assembly, I bought super sliders used for moving furniture and attached them to the cabinet sides at the bottom. This helps moved the cabinets for cleaning the floor, etc. I am pleased with the cabinets and would recommend them. A regular ironing board will not fit in these cabinets but brooms will.
customer_reviews.author: Mead1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for The Office
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a new office with no storage in the bathrooms & this is in the mens room (got the 3 cabinet ones for the women's room). It fits perfect & has the perfect amount of storage. Comes with a divider for inside the cabinets, but I didn't need to use that as I am just storing what is in the picture. Couldn't be happier with the quality, price & how it looks. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good units.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, for its purpose. Easy to assemble. Spacious enough although wish the shelves can be adjusted. Doors can be sagging over time but not a big deal. Light enough to be move into place by oneself. About 5'6 in height in case one is wondering how tall. Bought 2 units and none came with any problems. The back is just a piece of cardboard, wish it a bit bigger to actually cover the whole back. It a few cm short in all. Somehow I missed the complete unit photos. Oh well. For the price definitely good
customer_reviews.author: Booluvgoo

customer_reviews.title: Great as long as you didn’t want to hang anything
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Not great quality but serves it’s purpose for the most part. Very irritating that the closet rods that came with this are too short (by about 4 inches) and now have to go buy new rods. The main reason we purchased was to hang coats in a utility room but can’t hang anything until we buy new rods. Purchased two and it is a problem with both. Still looks nicer than a free standing closet rack and seems plenty roomy for our stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hickox

customer_reviews.title: All together a very easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy. But designed well. All panels perfectly cut and drilled to fit together (Seemed to automatically snug down into the intended shape. All provided hardware seemed to be top quality. The nearest thing to a delay in assembly was getting out and using my own drill, bits and c-clamps to drill holes for handle the rest of the way through. Hinges needed adjustment, but the ability to adjust them was designed into the hinges themselves. All together a very easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I would have given this a 4 or 5 if I hadn’t had been missing so many screws. You do have to buy your own 3” wood screws to mount it. Which i didn’t know before hand so it slowed me down a bit. But I was supposed to be provided 5/8” wood screws to put the doors together. I didn’t even have half. So I had to buy those too. Didn’t see any contact for getting the needed parts. Otherwise, feels sturdy and looks pretty nice for a laundry room set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet is OK but missing back panel
customer_reviews.text: This base cabinet was relatively easy to assemble, only because my husband had the proper tools and the knowledge to do it. I was disappointed this did not have a back panel, as the baseboards prevent it from sitting flush to the wall. The left door had a chip off it (see picture). Other than that it serves the purpose for which I purchased it -- for my air fryer and storage of its accessories. I also purchased this because it has a melamine top which is good for the air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.....cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I purchased 6 of these thinking this would be a good storage solution. 1) Only build these in the area you will use them. Moving them results in the pressed wood flaking and breaking off - MOVED THESE EMPTY ONLY A FEW INCHES. 2) Transportation and delivery method is not kind to this type of cheap pressed wood....you WILL have visual dings. The back of the unit is cardboard and contributes to the flimsy feel of the cabinets. I simply don't see these lasting very long at all - so if you are looking for a cheap, temporary disposable storage, this is for you. I you are looking for quality, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Trombley

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy for an MDF cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy for an MDF cabinet, assembly was very easy. As others have mentioned the holes for the handles are only drilled through on the backside of the doors and must be drilled to finish and also there is no cover on the backside. I am happy with my purchase and may purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Baylor

customer_reviews.title: Good economy cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have it one of the sides was damaged. Packing could be better to prevent this. Don't want to deal with sending it back for a nickel sized dent. Not to difficult to put together. Would be easier if panels were marked as to what they are. Some shelves are pre-drilled for the top, bottom and middle. Doors have to adjusted to get them to fit correctly but after a few times they come together with no gap. Door pulls are much nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla DeChambeau

customer_reviews.title: Look Great but Easy to Damage Edges
customer_reviews.text: These cabinets were super easy to assemble and seem sturdy but do NOT accidentally bump into anything because they will get damaged quite easily. The edges are easily damaged too. One cabinet came with damage on the side near the bottom; I didn’t return it because you can’t see it when installed. Overall, decent for the cost and do look nice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walk the Prime Queen

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2... Sending both back!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the first box. There was damaged pieces, no packing material, and missing parts (all hardware and the clothing rod). I closed it and opened the second box. Even though the second box had more visible damage on the outside, nothing inside was damaged. I proceeded to unbox it. It has most of the hardware, just missing the screws and instructions (I think the screws was all that was missing, but without instructions, I don't really know). So, I ordered two and cannot even put one together...
customer_reviews.author: LA, the state.

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a good, solid cabinet. I bought it to use in my bathroom area. I don’t have storage in there, except for under the sink cabinets. My walk in closet is roomy enough to put this cabinet in it. It arrived with no problems. It was packed well, nothing was cracked, broken or missing. I’m reasonably handy, read directions and lay things out before I start. It can be assembled by one person , but it is easier with two. My friend and I put it together in just over an hour. It holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy O.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed after having been satisfied with past products from this company
customer_reviews.text: the wall cabinet floor sagged in the middle. We bought this set of storage cabinets because we were very happy with a past purchase of tall cabinets from same company. This one disappointed and I would not recommend again. Tall cabinets are OK, but the double width wall cabinet was not adequately rigid and sagged under the weight of sheets and towels.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G

customer_reviews.title: Label components please!
customer_reviews.text: Was relatively easy to assemble after figuring out which component is which, considering that they are not labeled and no dimensions are given for each! You have to look at each and compare to illustration and guess which is which. That being said it seems sturdy and once you’ve deciphered what components go where it’s not too hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McKernan

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together, solid piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: This was shockingly easy to put together. I did it by myself, and it only took an hour. The only tricky part was attaching the doors by myself...a second person would've made that much easier. I used a drill, which made the process go much quicker. Sometimes you get these pieces of furniture home and the parts barely fit together, or you have missing pieces, etc. This was the opposite. It's also a great piece of furniture for the price point. I will definitely buy Prepac furniture in the future. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Stern

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small, clean looking cabinet for my laundry room and this was perfect for brooms and all that stuff I keep in there. It was an awkward spot I needed it for and it fit in it like a glove. It only took about 30 mins to put together, but it's heavy so if you don't lift, get help.
customer_reviews.author: Yma

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Defective, But gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Door came dented. Luckily, these are for the garage so the looks aren't that important. Trying to get the doors aligned is pretty much impossible with the location of the holes. Don't want to have to send back because of the defected door because it is EXTREMELY heavy. I couldn't even move the box by myself to get it in the house when it was delivered. It was difficult even with two people. It is better than nothing. But the quality is crappy. Hopefully it lasts longer than a plastic flimsy wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Frances M.

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect fit for the small space in my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made little cabinet. Yes, it's mostly MDF, but thoughtfully designed and reasonably priced. It's a perfect fit for the small space in my laundry room, and I now have a nice "folding area" on the top so when I take clothes out of the dryer I don't have to just dump them in the basket. The storage space inside is ample to hold a lot of miscellaneous items that seem to end up in the laundry room. In addition, it was very easy to assemble. It is very heavy, so I would suggest having someone to help you move it where you need it, or to assemble in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Check product thoroughly.
customer_reviews.text: Check it thoroughly after delivery. I had one open box that was poorly retaped bu UPS I suppose and another was in perfect conditon. Unfortunately the good box had broken product and the open box arrived without damage. Other than the inconvenience of hauling it back to ship UPS as a returned product the other one I recieved was was as advertised and what I expected..
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Sports

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, sturdy cabinet for a small space
customer_reviews.text: After having a nightmare of a time assembling a desk purchased at Wally World, I was completely dreading putting this together. But it was no problem at ALL! It took less than an hour! The instructions were very clear and laid out in logical order. The cabinet is incredibly sturdy and offers a LOT of storage for a small space. I put it in my new bathroom and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JOY NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: I try not to leave bad reviews, but this 32” storage system is just sub par. I ordered this as a test item to see if I wanted to use this brand for a garage storage system. I def will not be going forward with it. Pro’s Easy to assemble Cons Smaller than anticipated. Surface scratches and chips easily Doors have a gap even after playing around with it Door hinges interfere with putting in shelves
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to assemble and roll of the dice via parts.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are extremely limited, basically 2-pictures of: put all the screws in all the holes in all the pieces to make closet.. have fun! The pieces are heavy so it's easy to damage without having someone/hardware to help support the pieces during assembly because of the weight each individual piece puts on the joints/hinges. Despite this, the assembly was manageable until literally the last piece; the hinge screw hole was so slightly too small for the included screw, and was without threading. I tried to see if it'd hold together minus the one screw, and it failed to. 0/5 waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is exactly what I needed to store our school supplies and learning activities. I needed somewhere to keep them out of the reach of a 3 year old. I would've given it 5 stars, but the left front door was damaged during shipping and one of the screws for the door handles didn't have any threads. I was going to report the damage to the company, but I found their customer service site too time consuming to use.
customer_reviews.author: David Jackson

customer_reviews.title: heavy, but nice
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to conceal all my kid's junk... and this bad boy did the trick!!! i took my daughters three drawer sterilite storage shin-dig in it and then all my baby's junk in it too! i left the extra shelves out.. it has the one middle one for support and i left the two others out and i couldnt be happier! now all my kid's junk is concealed and my living room is more open!
customer_reviews.author: T_Tarv_Willz

customer_reviews.title: Great way to use a corner for storage in a bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Renovating our bath and wanted to have towel and miscellaneous storage in the bath but had limited space. This corner cabinet is perfect. Looks very nice when assembled and sits in a corner so it is basically out of the way. Well packed shipping carton and excellent instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Turfcat

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are pretty great and pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for my kitchen to use as a pantry and the other for my garage, but instead I am using it as a linen/movie closet. For the price these are pretty great and pretty easy to put together. My one complaint is that when it comes to installing the doors, I had to adjust the screws several times and fiddle with it quite a bit before the doors would line up evenly. On one of them I was not able to get the doors to match up perfectly, but they are close and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner JD

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward assembly, nice addition to play room.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't take too long to out together, the instructions were clear. My door was a little scuffed but that isn't a big deal since it's going in a kids play room. I did attach to the wall with the included brackets because I was worried the kids would tip it over.
customer_reviews.author: RockChalkJayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my other wardrobes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not for a broom closet but as a dress closet to go with my other wardrobes by this company. It didn't come with a clothing bar so I added one myself. It was a great solution. The length of the closet works great for my dresses and rompers. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kielha

customer_reviews.title: Stability and effectiveness at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, maybe 45min with two,people, but only need a second person for a few minutes. Works great for what it is. I searched a long time for something cheap and effective. Packing was also excellent. I don’t like the stupid little caps they give you t cover the screws, just poor idea, but doesn’t effect the product at all. So, we the money imho On a note about shipping, Amazon was wya off, took an extra week to get it,
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Swafford

product_meta.title: Prepac Elite Wardrobe Cabinet, 32", White
product_meta.description: Color:White| Style:Elite 32" Wardrobe CabinetThe Elite 32" wardrobe cabinet is welcome in any part of the house, either as a stand-alone product or when combined with other pieces in the Elite collection. The hanging Rail is ideal for storing jackets, coats and other hanger-friendly clothing, while the fixed top shelf suits hats, scarves and other small items. Increase storage space by adding the optional Elite 32" stackable wall cabinet on top for a total of 89 vertical inches of storage. Ships ready to assemble, includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly and has a 5-year Manufacturer’s limited warranty on parts. Manufactured in Canada and meets all North American safety standards. Every day liquids that are spilled and quickly wiped up will not damage our products. However, as with any wood-based furniture, continuous exposure to liquids or high humidity may cause damage.
feature_bullets: Finished in Durable Fresh White Laminate
Assembled Dimensions: 32"W x 65"H x 20"D; Internal Dimensions: 30.25"W x 59"H x 18.75"D
2 fixed shelves and 1 hanging rod; 20-inch depth accommodates hangers
Durable, solid handles in classic brushed nickel
Doors feature high quality, European-style 6-way adjustable hinges; MDF doors with profiled (rounded) edges add a level of sophistication
Constructed from CARB-2 compliant, laminated composite woods with a sturdy MDF backer; Ships Ready to Assemble and includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly
Manufactured in Canada and meets all North American safety standards; 5-year manufacturer’s limited on parts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,476 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Finished in Durable Fresh White Laminate
